tools.name: create_network
tools.description: Create a NeKo network from a list of genes and/or a SIF file

tools.name: add_gene
tools.description: Add a gene to the current network

tools.name: remove_gene
tools.description: Remove a gene from the current network

tools.name: export_network
tools.description: Export the current network in specified format (SIF or BNET)

tools.name: network_dimension
tools.description: Get the dimensions (number of nodes and edges) of the current network

tools.name: list_genes_and_interactions
tools.description: List all genes and interactions in the current network

tools.name: find_paths
tools.description: Find paths between source and target genes in the network

tools.name: reset_network
tools.description: Reset the current network (clear all data)

tools.name: clean_generated_files
tools.description: Clean generated files from a specified folder

tools.name: get_help
tools.description: Get help information about NeKo tools and usage

tools.name: remove_bimodal_interactions
tools.description: Remove bimodal interactions from the current network

tools.name: remove_undefined_interactions
tools.description: Remove undefined interactions from the current network

tools.name: list_bnet_files
tools.description: List all BNET files in a specified folder

tools.name: check_bnet_files_names
tools.description: Check BNET file names for validity and consistency

tools.name: check_disconnected_nodes
tools.description: Check for disconnected nodes in the current network

tools.name: get_references
tools.description: Get references for interactions between specified nodes
